cause.description:
In order for this country to get back on its feet and bring peace to the world, there is one issue that must be solved to get things in motion. Justin needs to find a special someone, and if you are a single lady who is having a hard time getting over the idea of dating such a sexy person, don't worry you definitely have a chance!
Justin is now accepting: quizzes, applications, phone numbers, e-mails, screen names, date invitations, and much more! so don't be afraid! who knows? maybe you could be the next lucky girl to sweep Justin off his feet, although you may have to be blunt because Justin is often clueless at hints and signs.
:)
He hopes to hear from you soon!
1. Justin is very single and very available
2. Justin is a nice guy who likes to make people laugh
3. It isn't right to let such a sexy guy go to waste :D lol
cause.mission: if you can't tell, don't even bother to support it
cause.name: Help Justin Get a Girlfriend
